name: AJAX Chat
body:
### AJAX Chat
AJAX Chat is a free and fully customizable open source web chat software implemented in JavaScript, PHP and MySQL. Sound support is implemented using Flash, Socket support using Flash on client-side and Ruby on server-side.

### Authors and Contributors
Sebastian Tschan (@blueimp) - Founder (inactive)
Philip Nicolcev (@frug) - Project Leader

And many contributions from the community. See the included readme file for a full list of people who contributed bugfixes and localizations. 

### Support or Contact
Check out the wiki at https://github.com/Frug/AJAX-Chat/wiki
tagline: AJAX Chat is a fully customizable web chat implemented in JavaScript, PHP and MySQL which integrates nicely with common forum systems like phpBB, MyBB, PunBB, SMF and vBulletin. A Flash and Ruby based socket connection can be used to boost performance.
